summary: ShareDrape (or CoVogue) - A luxury fashion co-ownership platform where users can share designer dresses in groups. Features group ownership, rotation scheduling, AI damage detection, escrow payments via Stripe, authentication, real-time chat, and resale marketplace. Premium UI with rose pink, ivory, charcoal, and gold palette. Built with React, TypeScript, and Motoko backend on Internet Computer.
architectural_notes: Frontend: React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion for animations
Backend: Motoko (Internet Computer) instead of Node.js/Express/MongoDB
Storage: Cloudinary for dress photos and cleaning certificates
Payments: Stripe integration (adjusted from Razorpay) with escrow simulation
Real-time: Socket.io for group chat functionality
AI Integration: OpenAI Vision API or Clarifai for damage detection via image comparison
UI Theme: Premium fashion aesthetic - Playfair Display (headings) + DM Sans (body), mobile-first responsive design
Color Palette: Deep rose pink (#E91E63), ivory white (#FFF8F0), charcoal (#1C1C1C), gold accent (#FFD700)
Business Logic: 10-15% platform commission, priority slot fees to initiator, 10% deposits per person, resale proceeds distributed proportionally
Security: JWT authentication + Google OAuth, proper error handling, form validation, environment variable configuration
known_issues: Browse dresses page throws error: Select.Item components have empty string value props causing placeholder conflicts
